disclaimer.title: Disclaimer - English
disclaimer.text:
The information provided by this chatbot is for informational purposes only. The chatbot is an automated system and provides responses based on the questions entered and the available data.

Please note the following points:

No professional advice: The information provided by the chatbot does not replace professional advice, whether legal, medical, financial, or otherwise. For specific concerns, you should consult qualified professionals.

No warranty: Although we strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information, we cannot guarantee the completeness, accuracy, or timeliness of the content provided.

Use at your own risk: Use of the information and responses you receive from this chatbot is at your own risk. We are not liable for any losses or damages resulting from the use of or reliance on the information provided.

Privacy: Please note that personal data you enter into the chat may be stored or processed. Read our privacy policy to learn more about how we handle your data.

By using this chatbot, you agree to these terms.
